title: 2014 Hashtags: #MuslimApologies Grew Out Of Both Anger And Whimsy
teaser: Maha Hilal helped launch #MuslimApologies partly as a rebuttal to the more earnest hashtag, #NotInOurName. She tells Audie Cornish how it reflects a divisive conversation in the Muslim community.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
